titles.title: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Arts to make grants for housing.
To prohibit the National Endowment for the Arts to make grants for housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Development.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the National Endowment for the Arts from using any funds to make grants for housing, including for housing artists.
